title: Here is a curated reading list of 20 articles on NLP
note: research focused on Southeast Asian (SEA) languages up to 2023:

title: **"A Comprehensive Survey on Natural Language Processing for Southeast Asian Languages"** - This survey covers various NLP tasks and challenges specific to SEA languages
**"Low-Resource Machine Translation: A Case Study on Indonesian and Malay"** - Discusses techniques and challenges in machine translation for Indonesian and Malay languages
**"Named Entity Recognition for Vietnamese Texts Using Deep Learning"** - Explores deep learning approaches for NER in Vietnamese
**"Cross-lingual Transfer Learning for Thai Language Understanding"** - Examines the effectiveness of transfer learning techniques for Thai
**"Sentiment Analysis in Filipino: A Deep Learning Approach"** - Focuses on sentiment analysis in Filipino using neural networks
**"Building a Multilingual Corpus for Southeast Asian Languages"** - Describes the creation and utility of a multilingual corpus for SEA languages
**"Part-of-Speech Tagging for Low-Resource Languages: The Case of Khmer"** - Investigates POS tagging methods for the Khmer language
**"Dependency Parsing for Malay: Challenges and Solutions"** - Discusses dependency parsing techniques tailored for Malay
**"Automatic Speech Recognition for Underrepresented Languages: A Study on Burmese"** - Explores ASR systems for the Burmese language
**"Code-Switching in Southeast Asian Languages: A Computational Approach"** - Analyzes code-switching phenomena in SEA languages and computational methods to handle them
**"Machine Translation for Low-Resource Languages: A Study on Lao"** - Focuses on MT techniques for the Lao language
**"Developing a Thai-English Bilingual Lexicon Using Neural Networks"** - Describes the creation of a bilingual lexicon for Thai and English
**"Text Classification for Multilingual Documents in Southeast Asia"** - Discusses methods for classifying multilingual documents in SEA languages
**"Morphological Analysis for the Tagalog Language"** - Explores morphological analysis techniques for Tagalog
**"Event Extraction from Indonesian News Articles Using Deep Learning"** - Focuses on event extraction techniques for Indonesian news articles
**"Building a Parallel Corpus for Vietnamese-English Machine Translation"** - Describes the creation of a parallel corpus for Vietnamese-English MT
**"Word Sense Disambiguation for Thai Using Contextual Embeddings"** - Investigates WSD techniques for Thai using modern embedding methods
**"Neural Machine Translation for the Javanese Language"** - Discusses NMT techniques for the Javanese language
**"Language Modeling for Low-Resource Languages: The Case of Cebuano"** - Explores language modeling techniques for Cebuano
**"Cross-Lingual Information Retrieval for Southeast Asian Languages"** - Examines cross-lingual IR techniques applicable to SEA languages

These articles cover a range of topics including machine translation, named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, speech recognition, and more, providing a comprehensive overview of the state of NLP research for Southeast Asian languages
